text: White Men Can't Jump is a basketball video game developed by High Voltage Software and published by Atari. The game was made for the Atari Jaguar. The game was released July of 1995 in North America. White Men Can't Jump is based on the movie of the same name. The video game is said to be one of the worst video games that was released on the Atari Jaguar due to poor graphics and other factors. ==Other websites== *White Men Can't Jump at MobyGames Category:1995 video games Category:Atari Jaguar games Category:Atari video games Category:Basketball video games Category:Video games based on movies
title: White Men Can't Jump (video game)
